title: How are immigrant indian men able to marry non indian women at high rates in US?
selftext:
I was checking the interracial marriage rates of different communities in US and it is only indian immigrant men who have such high out marry rates (twice as high as immigrant women). Just wanted to ask even though most us born men here feel their dating image is ruined by immigrants and their creepy image and us born women don't marry immigrant men but they themselves do pretty fine it seems by the data. Why do you think the data says so?

For immigrant men it's 20% outmarry rate while for immigrant women it's 10%

[https://twitter.com/Noahpinion/status/986761107602681857](https://twitter.com/Noahpinion/status/986761107602681857)

scroll up this tweet to see the difference between us born and total to see the difference in choosing white partners.

[https://carnegieendowment.org/2021/06/09/social-realities-of-indian-americans-results-from-2020-indian-american-attitudes-survey-pub-84667](https://carnegieendowment.org/2021/06/09/social-realities-of-indian-americans-results-from-2020-indian-american-attitudes-survey-pub-84667)

just skim through the rest of the data points
comments: They aren't as restricted as to which ethnicity they can marry plus guys going abroad are successful in their careers and are usually the complete opposite of the creepy guy stereotype

The answer is - $

Most Indian immigrants in USA make a six figure salary.  And they are very well educated. And people have this illusion that Indian men are "family guys".
And loyal to goris so... It's a win win
Indian men are just successful most of the times, also our image isn't ruined abroad as much as people think
